sense.name: 国家 country, nation, state
sense.examples:
改善一个国家与其他国家的贸易关系很重要
It is important to improve a country's trade relationships with other countries.
国家实力
the actual strength of a nation

sense.name: 用于个別国名之后,例如日本国，used after the name of the country
sense.examples:
蒙古国
Mongolia (nation)
日本国很富有
Japan (nation) is very rich.

sense.name: 国中的简称， abbreviation of junior high school
sense.examples:
国二
second year in junior high school
他国三时成绩突飞猛进。
He made a mighty advance in his grades when he was in the third year in junior high school.

sense.name: 与中国相关的东西,例如国乐，used to describe something related to Chinese such as Chinese orchestra
sense.examples:
国画
Chinese paintings
国语
Chinese (language)
她热爱国乐。
She loves Chinese orchestra a lot.
